channel.title: CLR on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in CLR on Niels Berglund

item.title: Beginners F# Resources
item.description:
This post is more as a reminder to myself where to find online resources when learning F#. If anyone else can find it useful, so much better. And, if anyone out there has other online, resources, please leave a comment and I will include it. So, in no particular order:

  • Introductory article by Luke Hoban in MSDN Magazine.
  • An online book about F#.
  • Tutorial, by Dejan Jelovic, about getting started with F# from a C# developers perspective.
  • Brian McNamara has great info and resource list, highly recommended.

Finally, a list like this would be incomplete without the link to the Man himself: Don Syme
